member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DpiCompensationEffect
member.summary: Scales an input bitmap to match a different DPI. This is useful for situations where a bitmap is created or loaded at a different DPI than the screen.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D DPI compensation effect.
